name: Fancy Band Bridal Headpiece
description:
Hand woven, One of a kind, Bridal headpiece
Straw headband designed as a variation of a 1950's "GiGi " hat of my mothers. I made the frame of buckram and braided it with ecru color antique cellophane straw. It is lined internally with satin brocade and trimmed with veiling and an antique button on each side. This is a beautifully designed hat and can be worn many ways.  Will fit a size small to large.

name: Turban Hairband
description: Millinery 2 " headband covered in chenille I hand made with fabric scraps. This is a turban style hairband and will fit any size head. I trimmed it flowers I made also with scraps and an antique button. I have A Variety of colors available.

name: Braided Tears Bridal hat
description:
Braided Tears
Teardrop shaped small cap, of antique cellophane straw of a natural ecru color. I braided this straw on a buckram frame and lined the inside with a satin brocade fabric. This hat fits nicely on the head and will accommodate a variety of hairstyles. Will fit a size small to large.

name: Buff Beret Hat
description:
For the Bride and the Brave
Handmade buckram frame on my Beret Block, with handwoven vintage cellophane straw. I lined it internally  with a soft interlining and 
finished it off with raw silk fabric including the headband. I trimmed it with a rosette and antique button. Fits measurements of  21 1/4-23 1/2, 
Sizes 6 3/4-7 3/8, Small to large

name: Grass Frolic
description: Xian Seagrass cloche, I hand blocked and trimmed the brim with contrasting sisal straw. It Has an antique button in the back. Measurement 22 3/4, Size 7 1/4, Large.
